# allowPublic

**Type Property**

The option that grants access to anyone who has the share link.

## Declaration

```swift
static var allowPublic: UICloudSharingController.PermissionOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

To give the user the option to allow anyone to access the shared data, include the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController/PermissionOptions/allowPublic] option when setting the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController/availablePermissions] property on the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICloudSharingController] instance.

## Constants

- **allowPrivate**: The option that restricts access to people who have been invited.
- **allowReadOnly**: The option that gives participants read-only permission to the shared data.
- **allowReadWrite**: The option that gives participants read/write permission to the shared data.
